text: @DHSCgovuk @CMO_England @NHSEngland @PHE_uk @CMOWales @PublicHealthW @scotgovhealth @healthdpt @publichealthni Oh well its great that boris has cancelled briefings, made plans to ease lockdown even more and given many the impression covid19 has been vanquished. We only have had over 600 deaths in past four days and positive tests nudging back over 1000 for second day. Great job cabinet.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
